mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(userId, password, name, phoneNumber, email, birth) VALUES(#{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{birth})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT userId FROM user WHERE userId=#{userId});
